VRDisplayCancelAnimationFrame.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The cancelAnimationFrame() method of the interface is a special implementation of that unregisters callbacks registered with .

blockquote.para: Note: This method was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.
